lines.text: assign value 10 + 5 to constant integer N
create integers m , n and res
a is an array of characters N by N
row and col are boolean arrays with N elements and eaten is an boolean array with N by N elements
lines.code: bool row [ N ] , col [ N ] , eaten [ N ] [ N ] ;

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to m inclusive read a [ i ] + 1
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= m ; i ++ ) cin >> ( a [ i ] + 1 ) ;

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to m inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= m ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = 1 to n inclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ )

lines.text: if a [ i ] [ j ] = ' S ' , set row [ i ] and col [ j ] to true
lines.code: if ( a [ i ] [ j ] == ' S ' ) row [ i ] = true , col [ j ] = true ;

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to m inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= m ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = 1 to n inclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ )

lines.text: if eaten [ i ] [ j ] is false , set eaten [ i ] [ j ] to true and increment res
lines.code: if ( ! eaten [ i ] [ j ] ) eaten [ i ] [ j ] = true , res ++ ;
for ( int j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ )

lines.text: for integer i = 1 to m inclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= m ; i ++ )

lines.text: if eaten [ i ] [ j ] is false , set eaten [ i ] [ j ] to true and increment res
lines.code: if ( ! eaten [ i ] [ j ] ) eaten [ i ] [ j ] = true , res ++ ;
